body: i think yhey should sell lvl up boost or they make it easier to lvl up it took my uncle a year to gt to lvl 30 hell no i aint waiting that long and ive got a suppesion cause my game crashed so unfair

replies.body:
A year? Does he play like, one game a month? It usually only takes around 60 games to get to the level cap.

And the reason it's like that is to make sure that people who are entering ranked for the first time have the basic concepts of the game nailed down. League is an incredibly deep game. As much as you think you know about it, there's always a world more to know (I'm talking like, you could spend an entire year studying it and still not get it types of things to know).
